about_the_game:
Mission Twentynine is an action hack and slash. Defeat enemies and upgrade your character to suit any playstyle you could possibly wish for.
Do you want weaponry that will blow up any enemy to pieces? Or are you the type of person who prefers putting down a turret or two and watching your creations do the destruction for you? Perhaps you wish to be a dual wielding samurai, or why not all of them at once?

Whatever you want, you can do.

Mission Twentynine features:

  • Close to an infinite* combinations of upgrades and weapons to make each run truly unique and to your own liking.
  • Large variety of enemies in all shapes of sizes.
  • Weapons.
  • Explosions.
  • You

Oh yes.. There will be screenshake**



*Way less than infinite
**You can turn off screenshake if you wish

name: Mission Twentynine

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 and above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: High-end Iris Integrated, or Low-end GPU Card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: You've got weapons, you've got enemies, you've got an arena. You'll figure out the rest.
